Author: catzkacan
Text: Thank you so much! I’m leaving today instead because of insurance being slow, but I’m still really nervous. Your mom speech helped though lol!

Author: _leastofthese_
Text: I’ve been to drug/alcohol treatment 3x, each time was about a month (detox+inpatient). I won’t lie to you, it was fucking terrifying. But it was EXACTLY what I needed. I NEEDED to be reset, to be without my phone, to confront my disease in the presence of trained professionals. You are in my opinion making an incredibly brave decision. Treatment saved my fucking life and I’m sober today. Yes, it’s scary and unknown. But the discomfort means you’re growing. Growth is hella uncomfortable. It’s worth it. You’re worth it. Short term discomfort is a small price to pay!  I’ll be thinking of you and hoping for you. You can do this : ) (ps sorry for the total inspirational mom speech lmao)
